Package com.lochbridge.oath.otp

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HOTP
    An immutable representation of an HMAC-Based One-Time Password as per RFC 4226.
    HOTPBuilder
    A HMAC-based One-time Password (HOTP) builder.
    TOTP
    Class which represents a Time-based One-time Password as per RFC 6238.
    TOTPBuilder
    A Time-based One-time Password (TOTP) builder.
    TOTPValidator
    A Time-based One-time Password (TOTP) validator.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HmacShaAlgorithm
    Enumeration of HMAC-SHA algorithm types.
